info.title: API
info.description:
API 
 
 **/!\ Complex types such as *Dates* or *bytea* are labeled as *String* in this documentation. The given string's format describes what complex data type it stands for. You can retrieve these details in Models' description section down below.**

get.summary: Return a list of all business sessions
Return one business session
Return a list of business sessions

200.description: A list of business sessions for a given user

get.summary: Return a list of exercises

200.description: The list of exercises for a given business session

get.summary: Return a list of exercise productions

200.description: The list of exercise productions for a given business session and a given user

parameters.name: Session
parameters.description: The session id and the secret key

get.summary: Return a list of all business profiles
Return one business profile

post.summary: [Different route already implemented] Create a new course
post.description: *Different route already implemented* - __If used in the future, the actual route ('/API/course') should be replaced by this one.__

post.summary: [Different route already implemented] Add a user to the specified course
post.description: *Different route already implemented* - __If used in the future, the actual route ('/API/course/addUser') should be replaced by this one.__

200.description: User successfully added to the course

delete.summary: [Different route already implemented] Delete all users from a course
delete.description: *Different route already implemented* - Deletes all users from a course which id is given in path. __If used in the future, the actual route ('/API/course/delAllUser/{c_id}') should be replaced by this one.__

200.description: Users successfully deteled from the course

get.summary: [Different route already implemented] Get a course given its id
get.description: *Different route already implemented* - Get a course given its id. __If used in the future, the actual route ('/API/course/{c_id}') should be replaced by this one.__

get.summary: [Different route already implemented] Get the courses linked to an user given its id
get.description: *Different route already implemented* - Get the courses linked to an user given its id. __If used in the future, the actual route ('/api/course/user/{user_id}') should be replaced by this one.__

get.summary: [Different route already implemented] Get the users registered to a course given its id
get.description: *Different route already implemented* - Get the users registered to a course given its id. __If used in the future, the actual route ('/API/course/regUser/{c_id}') should be replaced by this one.__

200.description: The email has been successfully sent

Return one exercise

post.summary: Return a score and comment for a submited exercise
post.description: Return a score and comment for a submited exercise **Authorized roles [All]**

parameters.description: The exercise production, the exercise'id, the statement and the exercise's template_archive

get.summary: Generate a question archive for an exercise
get.description:
Generate a question archive for an exercise **Authorized roles [All]**
**Improvment to make : This route sends back a .tar archive but should send back a .tar.gz archive**

post.description:
*Different route already implemented : ('/sequence')* - Creates a new sequence
 **Authorized roles : [Enseignant, Admin]**

get.summary: Retrieve all sequences
Get one specific sequence
get.description:
*Different route already implemented* - Get one specific sequence, given its id.
 **Authorized roles : [Enseignant, Admin]**

put.description:
*Different route already implemented* - Updates a sequence.
 **Authorized roles : [Enseignant, Admin]**
**We can't update only some fields using that route. Must send the complete sequence's data because of how back-end is implemented.**

delete.description:
*Different route already implemented* - Deletes a sequence
 **Authorized roles : [Enseignant, Admin]**

get.summary: Get all the exercises that compose a sequence
get.description:
*Different route already implemented* - Get all the exercises that compose a sequence, given its id.
 **Authorized roles : [Enseignant, Admin]**
